Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>
    public class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent>

    View class

    Class which manages and creates the graphical user interface for the application. This is done by displaying the current state of model meaning it doesnt require knowledge of the game itself.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Amol Dhaliwal
